author: EXM7777
text:
something weird happened over the past few weeks...

i stopped switching between models

likeâ€¦ completely

> GPT-5 underperforms on everything i throw at it
> grok is not even close
> gemini 2.5 already feels outdated

and i'm starting to believe that for most users this is the best scenario

the truth is that you need one model that actually gets your work done, for YOUR own tasks

i'm using claude for 99% of mine now and honestly? i'm not looking back

unless google drops something insane (which i'm expecting), i'm good
